snippet: An online petition urged the Cubs to sign Adam Greenberg, a player who was hit in his first, and only, at-bat in the major leagues in 2005.
lead_paragraph: An online petition urged the Cubs to sign Adam Greenberg, a player who was hit in his first, and only, at-bat in the major leagues in 2005.

headline.seo: Ex-Cub, Hit by Pitch in Only Time Up, Pursues Second Chance
headline.main: One Pitch to the Head Proves a Lingering Blow
headline.print_headline: One Pitch to the Head Proves a Lingering Blow
